detail_desc: Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Blouse in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a collar, heart-shaped buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Short, flounced sleeves, a heart-shaped chest pocket and ties at the hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets, a print motif on one leg and ribbed hems.
Blouse in an airy textured weave with a wider neckline and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in woven fabric with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back and slits at the cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in woven fabric with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back and slits at the cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in woven fabric with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back and slits at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Long-sleeved top in a cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with ties at the front and flared sleeves with pleats at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in a cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with ties at the front and flared sleeves with pleats at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in a cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with ties at the front and flared sleeves with pleats at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in a cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with ties at the front and flared sleeves with pleats at the cuffs.

Dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with an integral bodysuit. Dress with a decorative bow at the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and an elasticated seam at the waist. Bodysuit with a concealed press-stud at the top and press-studs at the crotch.
Washed-look cotton top in sweatshirt fabric with long, raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Washed-look cotton top in sweatshirt fabric with long, raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Joggers in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Blouse in crinkled chiffon with a round neck, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Flounces at the cuffs and hem, and a longer double layer at the hem.
Blouse in crinkled chiffon with a round neck, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Flounces at the cuffs and hem, and a longer double layer at the hem.

Set with a wrapover bodysuit and trousers in ribbed organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at one side and at the crotch, and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated waist, fake fly with decorative buttons, and foldover ribbing at the hems.

Set with a wrapover bodysuit and trousers in ribbed jersey made from an organic cotton blend. Long-sleeved bodysuit with a frill trim at the top and press-studs at the side and crotch. Trousers with an elasticated waist and frill trim at the hems.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, kangaroo pocket at the front and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a super-soft fine knit with a wrapover V-neck and a practical inner top for ease of nursing access.
Jumper in a super-soft fine knit with a wrapover V-neck and a practical inner top for ease of nursing access.
Jumper in a super-soft fine knit with a wrapover V-neck and a practical inner top for ease of nursing access.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft, cotton sweatshirt fabric. Hoodie with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft, cotton sweatshirt fabric. Hoodie with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft, cotton sweatshirt fabric. Hoodie with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft, cotton sweatshirt fabric. Hoodie with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short necklace with fabric-covered beads. Adjustable length 45-57 cm.
Non-wired lace bralette with mesh-lined triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow double shoulder straps, wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Non-wired lace bralette with mesh-lined triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow double shoulder straps, wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Soft, non-wired lace up bra with lined cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and front fastening.
Soft, non-wired lace up bra with lined cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and front fastening.
Soft, non-wired lace up bra with lined cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and front fastening.

Lace underwired bra with decorative straps and mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Lace underwired bra with decorative straps and mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage with decorative lacing at the back.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage with decorative lacing at the back.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Body in soft marled jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a low-cut back, high-cut legs, lined gusset and string back.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted, mirrored lenses.
Round sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Bikini top with lightly padded cups, wide adjustable shoulder straps for good support, and a metal fastener at the back.
Bikini top with lightly padded cups, wide adjustable shoulder straps for good support, and a metal fastener at the back.

Handbag in grained imitation leather and imitation suede with a handle at the top and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap. One zipped inner compartment and a tab and metal fastener at the top. Size 15x25x32 cm.
Jumper in a fine, fluffy knit with an intarsia motif on the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Jumper in a fine, fluffy knit with an intarsia motif on the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
